author: Clarissa-Jan Lim
title: What's behind the extreme heat wave in Brazil that forced Taylor Swift to postpone a show
description: Thousands of Taylor Swift's fans in Brazil have braved extreme heat to watch the singer perform on her wildly popular "Eras Tour."
content: Brazil is experiencing an unusually intense springtime heat wave that has endangered lives, caused power outages and exacerbated drought in the Amazon. The dangers of the punishing heat were undersco… [+1813 chars]

author: Ja'han Jones
title: GOP rising star Mark Robinson’s wretched Facebook feed lands him in trouble ... again
description: North Carolina’s lieutenant governor, a rising star in the GOP, appears to have posted comments on Facebook quoting Hitler and minimizing the Holocaust.
content:
Newly unearthed social media posts apparently shared by North Carolina Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson are creating yet more controversy for someone seen as a rising star in the GOP. 
Robinson, whos viewed a… [+2100 chars]

author: Dave Zirin
title: The Philadelphia Eagles' signature 'tush push' is effectively driving its critics mad
description: Philadelphia and Jalen Hurts beat the Miami Dolphins on Sunday. The Eagles' only crime with its "brotherly shove" is making football fourth downs less dramatic.
content: Officials in the National Football League must be feeling happy that  in the seventh week of the 2023-24 regular season, the No. 1 story swirling around the league is not staggering concussions, or o… [+5199 chars]
